text: 1:25 2 Korin 13:4Nguazimɨn itir gumazamiziba kamaghɨn nɨghnɨgha ghaze, “Godɨn nɨghnɨzir maba bar ongani.” Ezɨ nɨghnɨzir kamra bar gumazamizibar nɨghnɨzibagh afira. Ezɨ me kamaghɨn nɨghnɨsi, Godɨn arazir maba kamaghɨn en akakasi, God gavgaviba puvatɨ. Ezɨ an arazir kabara bar gavgavigha, bar gumazamizibar gavgavim gafira.
